response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. This product is not just an item, it's an experience tailored to enhance your lifestyle. Considering its quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than the standard market price.
